projects.title: Alappuzha Heritage Project
projects.description: Comprehensive heritage tourism project including the conservation of the Port Museum, Yarn Museum, Coir History Museum, Living Coir Museum, and Labour Movement Museum. Includes canal beautification, sea bridge construction, and renovation of heritage structures like Saukar Masjid and Makam Masjid.
projects.impact: Revitalizing the historic port town and boosting heritage tourism.

projects.title: Alappuzha - Changanassery (AC) Road Semi-Elevated Highway
projects.description: Reconstruction of the 24.164 km Alappuzha-Changanassery road as a semi-elevated highway using soil stabilization technology to prevent flooding during monsoons. Includes flyovers and bridges.
projects.impact: Ensures flood-resilient connectivity through the Kuttanad region.

projects.title: Mega Food Park, Cherthala
projects.description: A seafood-focused industrial park at Pallippuram, Cherthala, with common infrastructure like cold storage, deep freezers, and standard design factories. Grant assistance from MoFPI.
projects.impact: Expected to attract ₹600 crore investment and generate 3,000 jobs.

projects.title: Kuttanad Drinking Water Project - Phase II
projects.description: Second phase of the comprehensive drinking water supply scheme for the Kuttanad region.
projects.impact: Providing safe drinking water to the water-logged Kuttanad region.

projects.title: Coastal Highway Reach 1 (Alappuzha)
projects.description: Construction of Coastal Highway stretch from Valiyazheekkal to Thottapally (22.10 km).

projects.title: Coastal Highway Reach 2 (Alappuzha)
projects.description: Construction of Coastal Highway stretch from SH Bypass Crossing to South Chellanam (33 km).

projects.title: Oncology Pharma Park at KSDP
projects.description: Establishment of a cancer medicine manufacturing unit (Oncology Park) at Kerala State Drugs and Pharmaceuticals (KSDP), Alappuzha.

projects.title: Fishing Harbour at Chethy
projects.description: Construction of a new fishing harbour at Chethy.

projects.title: Perumbalam Bridge
projects.description: Construction of a bridge connecting Perumbalam island to the mainland.

projects.title: Modernizing Water Transport in Alappuzha Canals
projects.description: Renovation and modernization of Alappuzha town canals including cleaning, deepening, and beautification to improve water transport.
projects.impact: Reviving the canal network for tourism and transport.

projects.title: Development of District Hospital, Mavelikkara
projects.description: Major infrastructure development at District Hospital Mavelikkara.

projects.title: Construction of Zilla Court Bridge
projects.description: Construction of a new bridge near the Zilla Court in Alappuzha.

projects.title: Development of Taluk Hospital, Chettikad
projects.description: Construction and development of Taluk Hospital at Chettikad.
projects.impact: Better healthcare access for coastal communities.

projects.title: Construction of Groyne Fields (Kattoor, Ottamassery, etc.)
projects.description: Construction of groyne fields in severely eroded coastal belts at Ottamassery, Kattoor-Pollethai, Kakkazham, and Nellanickal.

projects.title: Development of District Hospital, Chengannur
projects.description: Infrastructure upgrades for District Hospital Chengannur.

projects.title: Development of TH Cherthala
projects.description: Development works at Taluk Hospital Cherthala.

projects.title: Development of Taluk Hospital, Thuravur
projects.description: Development of Taluk Hospital Thuravur.

projects.title: Punnamada Bridge
projects.description: Construction of Punnamada Bridge.

projects.title: Thottappally - Naluchira Bridge
projects.description: Construction of Thottappally - Naluchira Bridge.

projects.title: Pallathuruthi - Kainakary Bridge
projects.description: Construction of bridge connecting Pallathuruthi Out Post and Kainakary.

projects.title: Alappuzha Mobility Hub - Phase 1 (KSRTC Terminal)
projects.description: Development of Alappuzha Mobility Hub, Phase 1 includes KSRTC Bus Terminal Complex.

projects.title: WSS to Ala, Puliyoor, Budhanoor, Pandanad & Chengannur
projects.description: Water Supply Scheme to Ala, Puliyoor, Budhanoor, Pandanad, Mulakkuzha, Venmony Panchayaths and Chengannur Municipality.
projects.impact: Potable water for multiple panchayats and municipality.

projects.title: Arthungal Fishing Harbour Development (FIDF)
projects.description: Development of Arthungal Fishing Harbour (balance work) under Fisheries and Aquaculture Infrastructure Development Fund (FIDF).

projects.title: Development of Chethy Beach
projects.description: Development and beautification of Chethy Beach.

projects.title: Ambalapuzha Thiruvalla Road Phase 2
projects.description: Standardisation and Improvement of Ambalapuzha Thiruvalla Road stretch 1 and 2.

projects.title: Construction of New OP Block at GH Alappuzha
projects.description: Construction of a new Out Patient Block at General Hospital Alappuzha.

projects.title: Road from NH Vayalar Junction to Pallippuram Infopark
projects.description: Construction of road from NH Vayalar Junction to Pallippuram Infopark including a bridge across Vayalar Kayal.

projects.title: Thattassery Bridge
projects.description: Construction of Thattassery Bridge.

projects.title: Padaharam Bridge
projects.description: Construction of Padaharam Bridge across Pampa river.

projects.title: Preethikulangara School Stadium and Alappuzha EMS Stadium
projects.description: Development of Preethikulangara School Stadium and Alappuzha EMS Stadium.

projects.title: Udayakumar Indoor Stadium, Chengannur
projects.description: Balance works of construction of Udayakumar Indoor Stadium (District stadium) at Chengannur.

projects.title: Homco Factory, Alappuzha
projects.description: Construction of a new factory for Homco (Homeopathy medicine production) conforming to WHO GMP guidelines.
projects.impact: Center of excellence in homeopathy medicine production.

projects.title: Modern Abattoir in Cherthala
projects.description: Construction of a modern abattoir in Cherthala.

projects.title: Sabarimala Edathavalam (Chengannur)
projects.description: Construction of pilgrim shelter (Edathavalam) at Chengannur for Sabarimala pilgrims.

projects.title: Restoration of Ecosystem of Vembanad Lake (Aroor)
projects.description: Restoration of Ecosystem of Vembanad Lake and surrounding water bodies leading to the Lake in Aroor LAC Phase 1.

projects.title: Flood Control in Kuttanad
projects.description: Clearing obstructions in leading channel, 'Room for River' project implementation, and strengthening outer bunds.
projects.impact: Flood mitigation in the Kuttanad region.

projects.title: Augmentation of Water Supply in Alappuzha Municipality
projects.description: Augmentation and Modernization of Water Supply Distribution system in Alappuzha Municipality - Balance works.

projects.title: Kallumala ROB
projects.description: Construction of Kallumala Railway Over Bridge (LC no:28).

projects.title: Purakkad-Pathirapally Road Recycling
projects.description: Reconstruction of Purakkad-Pathirapally road using German Cold-in-Place recycling technology.

projects.title: Construction of Modern Crematorium
projects.description: Construction of modern gas crematoriums including in Kayamkulam.
